title: Drive
description:
She has come from the fog and is made of the fog...
When Gracie Doyle and her friends visit Old Castle's wrecking yard on Christmas Eve to say goodbye to their deceased friend Kelly Monroe, they unleash a malevolent force lurking within the eerie attraction known as 'The Kill Car'. Instead of finding closure, they open a mysterious portal to the supernatural world, plunging Gracie into a dark battle for survival as she grapples with twisted revenge and the murky boundaries between life and death.Turning to her friend's blind old grandmother for help, Gracie uncovers startling secrets within the House of Mirrors, where illusions veil sinister truths, blurring the line between reality and nightmare with each passing moment.
Step intoÂ the House of Mirrors...
author: Jonathan  Dunne
